nodes.bodyText:
It would be better to pass the application name as a variable here as well. Oauth server would either fill it with "Participant Manager" or with the App ID of the mobile application.
I am guessing this same reset-password is also used for participant manager and your change results in that email containing the word App, which we have not used for web applications so far.
